pr_title: Fix #6048 and fix inventory detection issues

timeline.message: Fix #6048 and fix inventory detection issues
fix inventory issues at the core

timeline.bodyText:
This method is either named wrong, or does literally not what is written on the can.
Rename the method.
Also make this a parallel stream. With more then 1000+ entries in that list of items this should help.
timeline.author: OrionDevelopment

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/compatibility/CompatibilityManager.java b/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/compatibility/CompatibilityManager.java
index fc70f8c6a..7882d93c5 100755
--- a/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/compatibility/CompatibilityManager.java
+++ b/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/compatibility/CompatibilityManager.java

@@ -223,9 +223,9 @@ public class CompatibilityManager implements ICompatibilityManager
     /**
      * Create complete list of blocks, client side only.
      */
-    private void discoverBlockList()
+    private void discoverAllItems()
     {
-        final List<ItemStack> stacks = StreamSupport.stream(Spliterators.spliteratorUnknownSize(ForgeRegistries.ITEMS.iterator(), Spliterator.ORDERED), false)
+        final List<ItemStack> stacks = StreamSupport.stream(Spliterators.spliteratorUnknownSize(ForgeRegistries.ITEMS.iterator(), Spliterator.ORDERED), true)
                                            .filter(item -> !(item instanceof EnchantedBookItem || item instanceof PotionItem))
                                            .map(ItemStack::new)
                                            .collect(Collectors.toList());
